text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>In denen Thurneysischen Buchläden allhier werden die ersten zwey Theile von folgendem Werck denen Herren Subseribenten ausgelieffert: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Roberti Stephani</AUTHOR><TITLE>Thesaurus Linguae Latinae post noviss. Londin. edit. insignitor auctam Annotationibus Henrici Stephani locupletatus</TITLE><NOTE>Nova cura recensuit digessit &c.</NOTE><AUTHOR>Ant. Birrius</AUTHOR><FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT></BIBL> Ingleichen geben sie auch den <BIBL><TITLE>T. Livium e Integr. Sigonii & Gronoviorum Norit</TITLE><VOLUME>3. Voll.</VOLUME><NOTE>auf schön Schreib-Median-Pappier</NOTE><FORMAT>8.</FORMAT><PRICE>fl. 6.</PRICE></BIBL> künfftige Wochen an die Herren Liebhaber aus, dieser Preiß aber währet nur biß Ende Januarii <YEAR>1740</YEAR>, nach welcher Zeit kein Eremplar unter <PRICE>7 fl. 30 xr.</PRICE> verkaufft werden solle.</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":14,"explanation":"1) Replaced mojibake/encoding errors with intended characters in running text: "Buchläden", "ausgelieffert", "auf schön Schreib-Median-Pappier", "künfftige", "Preiß", "währet", "biß" (4+ replacements counted as 4 corrections at string level).
2) Normalized and corrected Latin in the first TITLE: "Annokationibus" → "Annotationibus" and "Honrici" → "Henrici"; also lowercased "Locupletatus" to "locupletatus" for internal consistency (3 corrections).
3) The phrase "Nova cura retensuit digessit &c." was not properly delimited; wrapped it in a new <NOTE> element and corrected to "Nova cura recensuit digessit &c." including escaping ampersand (2 corrections: tag addition + spelling/escaping).
4) In the second BIBL, extended the title and corrected forms: "T. Lieium e. Integr." → "T. Livium e Integr.", and "Gronovior Norit" → "Gronoviorum Norit" (2 corrections).
5) The descriptive phrase "auf schön Schreib-Median- Pappier" belonged to the second bibliographical unit; moved it inside that BIBL and wrapped it in a <NOTE> element (1 correction for structural change/tagging).
6) Replaced non-XML tag <PRIZE> with more semantically standard <PRICE> and used it consistently for both price indications; two tags changed (2 corrections).
7) Escaped the standalone ampersand in "Sigonii & Gronoviorum" as "&" (already counted with point 4 spelling/escaping, not double-counted)."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM>In denen Thurneysischen Buchläden allhier werden die ersten zwey Theile von folgendem Werck denen Herren Subseribenten ausgelieffert: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Roberti Stephani</AUTHOR><TITLE>Thesaurus Linguae Latinae post noviss. Londin. edit. insignitor auctam Annotationibus Henrici Stephani locupletatus</TITLE><NOTE>Nova cura recensuit digessit &c.</NOTE><AUTHOR>Ant. Birrius</AUTHOR><FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT></BIBL> Ingleichen geben sie auch den <BIBL><TITLE>T. Livium e Integr. Sigonii & Gronoviorum Norit</TITLE><VOLUME>3. Voll.</VOLUME><NOTE>auf schön Schreib-Median-Pappier</NOTE><FORMAT>8.</FORMAT><PRICE>fl. 6.</PRICE></BIBL> künfftige Wochen an die Herren Liebhaber aus, dieser Preiß aber währet nur biß Ende Januarii <YEAR>1740</YEAR>, nach welcher Zeit kein Eremplar unter <PRICE>7 fl. 30 xr.</PRICE> verkaufft werden solle.</ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
1) Replaced mojibake/encoding errors with intended characters in running text: "Buchläden", "ausgelieffert", "auf schön Schreib-Median-Pappier", "künfftige", "Preiß", "währet", "biß" (4+ replacements counted as 4 corrections at string level).
2) Normalized and corrected Latin in the first TITLE: "Annokationibus" → "Annotationibus" and "Honrici" → "Henrici"; also lowercased "Locupletatus" to "locupletatus" for internal consistency (3 corrections).
3) The phrase "Nova cura retensuit digessit &c." was not properly delimited; wrapped it in a new <NOTE> element and corrected to "Nova cura recensuit digessit &c." including escaping ampersand (2 corrections: tag addition + spelling/escaping).
4) In the second BIBL, extended the title and corrected forms: "T. Lieium e. Integr." → "T. Livium e Integr.", and "Gronovior Norit" → "Gronoviorum Norit" (2 corrections).
5) The descriptive phrase "auf schön Schreib-Median- Pappier" belonged to the second bibliographical unit; moved it inside that BIBL and wrapped it in a <NOTE> element (1 correction for structural change/tagging).
6) Replaced non-XML tag <PRIZE> with more semantically standard <PRICE> and used it consistently for both price indications; two tags changed (2 corrections).
7) Escaped the standalone ampersand in "Sigonii & Gronoviorum" as "&" (already counted with point 4 spelling/escaping, not double-counted).
